member.name: M:NDceRpc.ServiceModel.FaultException`1.#ctor(System.String,System.Exception)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the Exception class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
member.param: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
The exception that is the cause of the current exception, or a null reference if no inner exception is specified.

member.name: M:NDceRpc.ServiceModel.FaultException`1.#ctor(`0,System.String,System.Exception)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the Exception class with additional arguments, a specified error message, and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
member.param: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
The exception that is the cause of the current exception, or a null reference if no inner exception is specified.

member.name: M:NDceRpc.ServiceModel.FaultException`1.GetObjectData(System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo,System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext)
member.summary: When overridden in a derived class, sets the SerializationInfo with information about the exception.
member.param: The SerializationInfo that holds the serialized object data about the exception being thrown.
The StreamingContext that contains contextual information about the source or destination.

member.name: M:NDceRpc.ServiceModel.FaultException`1.Equals(System.Object)
member.summary: Determines whether the specified Object is equal to the current Object.
member.param: The Object to compare with the current Object.
member.returns: true if the specified Object is equal to the current Object; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:NDceRpc.ServiceModel.FaultException`1.Details
member.summary: Returns a reference to this exception's additional arguments.
